interestingcomments.content:
What could I possibly do with an iPhone mounted to my DSLR’s hot shoe? /!/ I was looking at iPhone tripod mounts and thought about the possibility of a hot shoe mount instead, and [hit the jackpot](https://www.engadget.com/2012/04/17/mount-your-iphone-in-your-dslrs-hotshoe-dock/). 

All I could gather from the article was that it was good for geotagging and as a low-light autofocus aid, but I can’t imagine those are the only possible uses for a hot shoe. Any other thoughts?
